about:
Hello! I'm Arpita Rai, a passionate Software Developer with a strong background in cloud computing & software development. I am currently completing my Master of Science in Information Systems from Northeastern University, where I’ve deepened my expertise in object-oriented design, cloud infrastructure, and web development.
I have extensive experience in developing and deploying cloud-native applications and serverless architectures, having worked with companies like New York Life Digital R&D Lab, Innover Digital, and Siemens.

My technical toolkit includes Java, Spring Boot, AWS, Terraform, and React, among other cutting-edge technologies. Whether designing APIs to serve 10,000 users or optimizing workflows for legacy systems, I thrive on creating efficient, reliable solutions that drive innovation.

I also have a keen interest in DevOps, with hands-on experience in CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud deployment strategies.
Explore my work, and let’s connect!
